title: # Rules of the Server
description:
Welcome to the UMEngiQueers Discord Server! ðŸ‘‹
There are many channels for various discussion topics - check them out on the left-hand side of your screen.
https://discord.gg/BvrHQ4ADWv
rules: If discussing a sensitive topic, please try to put content inside a spoiler tag, and the topic being labeled with a trigger warning. e.g. `(TW: topic)||message||`
Be nice and respectful towards one another
Please do not disclose (i.e. out someone) without their permission (do not disclose personal details if they have the <@&1465467798745649153> role)
No sexual conduct, gore, or illegal content within this server
Please respect the topics for each channel
Please add your pronouns to your server profile (nickname)
If someone says something that annoys or offends you, contact an <@&1436500286498803842> via DM
